overview: The mountain spirit is always present in the art of living. This documentary sets out to meet people who are active in living well in the mountains. They all have one thing in common, the mountain is at the same time their place of life, their inspiration and their support. They will guide you in the Alps in order to know the secrets of mythical hotels, stonemasons, crystal makers or even chalet designers.

production_companies.name: Y.N Productions - La Cuisine aux images

title: Mountain Spirit
